name: Sacrifice (itch) (lrdazrl)
description:
This game was create by a two person team for GameDev.tv Game Jam 2022.
Time: May 20th 2022 at 21:00 - May 30th 2022 23:00 (UTC)
Theme: Death is only the Beginning

Note: there was some bugs in the the original build of the game so I have made updates trying to fix them still during the rating period as explicitly allowed by the jam rules.

CREDITS
Team:
Miro Aurela - Game Design, Programming, Music & Sound Design
Tiia Vastamäki - Visual Design, Sprite Artist

Special thanks:
Vendolis for providing a bug fix relating to ground checking.
